description:
Have you ever wondered how Astrology works?
Would you like to know where your natural talents lie?
Would you like to know why you've had difficulty in certain areas of your life?
Would you like to be able to decode the energies of your life path so that you can make better decisions about your future?
Would you like to be able to read charts for others?

If so, this course will teach you through fifty five entertaining and short animated lessons (over 90 minutes of video content) everything you need to know to get started in the mystical and fascinating world of Astrology.

The course is taught by renowned astrologer Henry Seltzer, creator of TimePassages software. Henry's software is used by both professional astrologers and novices alike. Well-known astrologers such as Rob Brezny, Alan Oken, Jan Spiller and many others use his software to cast their charts as well as generate reports for clients.
title: Learn the Basics of Astrology with Henry Seltzer
